org.carrot2.util.tests

Class CarrotTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • com.carrotsearch.randomizedtesting.RandomizedTest
        • org.carrot2.util.tests.CarrotTestCase

  • @SeedDecorators(value=com.carrotsearch.randomizedtesting.MixWithSuiteName.class)
public class CarrotTestCase
extends com.carrotsearch.randomizedtesting.RandomizedTest
    Base class for Carrot2 test classes. Contains common hooks and setups.
